alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 05 at 3:22AM MDT until September 05 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...The Custer County Plains, the Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
